body:
Hey guys, this is my submission for fouseytube's become a youtuber contest, he is giving away some cool prizes and this is my entry!

My video - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=dRvAPZHUKOw
How to enter the contest - https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vdH8b_AwSi4

Thanks guys, and I wish you guys good luck if you enter!

Thanks guys, and I wish you guys good luck if you enter!
title: Inspirational Speech / YouTuber Contest

replies.body: I tried taking you serious and really get into what you really want regarding your life around youtube, and I do understand you want to win this prize. But then I saw a video of yours where you asked a 11 year old boy multiple times if he ever masturbated and how he masturbates. It really made me sick, if you think you will win anything with those kind of videos you are way over your head.

replies.body:
S3M3L I never asked a him if he does that, nor did I call him that racial term. I am not racist, and I would never call anyone that, ESPECIALLY in a video. If you really have a problem with that video, I will be more than happy to remove it, but please stop bringing it up.
 And thank you to those of you who support me. <3

replies.body: Video removed. I do not want any more arguments to start regarding this matter.
replies.body_tagged: Video removed. I do not want any more arguments to start regarding this matter.

replies.body:
If you want to "do youtube" and become bigger than you are now, you should be able to handle constructive criticism. You should also man up and stand for your actions, both me and you know you did ask him those questions and we both know you said "nigga" in that "racist staff" video, when you thought you could sound "black".

I don't have any problems with you or your youtube, I'm giving you constructive criticism, you can't expect to get bigger if you do videos like that. You need to start a LP or series, something your subscribers can follow everyday, not a video once in a week where you call others nigga or nigger.

Next time I expect you to talk for yourself, not your friends to attack me.

replies.body:
Do you like building? Start series where you build something that will take time, like a city? Not just one or two houses, but a city, with all sorts of different builds!

Do you like building maps? Start series where the viewer can follow you while you are building your map. It doesn't matter if you are new or if you never did it before, try it out!
